    Skill

    new Skill(id, config, state)
    Skill.js, line 21

    Parameters:
    Name Type Description
    id string
    config object
    state GameState
    Properties:
    Name Type Description
    configureEffect function modify the skill's effect before adding to player
    cooldownLength null | number When a number > 0 apply a cooldown effect to disallow usage until the cooldown has ended
    effect string Id of the passive effect for this skill
    flags Array.<SkillFlag>
    info function Function to run to display extra info about this skill
    run function Function to run when skill is executed/activated
    state GameState
    type SkillType
